comments.body: We are trying to use the the SPDX version of the license strings, this one would be `LGPL-3.0`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@about:
  home: http://www.tcs.hut.fi/Software/bliss/
  license: LGPL3
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: COPYING.LESSER

comments.body: That is some jinja-ninja technique there. I wonder if the URL is stable enough for the bot though.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@
source:
  url: https://github.com/mkoeppe/bliss/releases/download/sage_package%2F{{ version }}{{ version_patch.replace(".", "%2B") }}/bliss-{{ full_version }}.tar.gz
# url: http://www.tcs.hut.fi/Software/bliss/bliss-{{ version }}.zip
